summary: This is an internal email chain from August 10, 2019, regarding the distribution of an approved press release about Jeffrey Epstein from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. It involves coordination between the Public Information Office and the MCC's associate warden on releasing the statement to media.

events.title: Approval and Distribution of Epstein Press Release
events.description: An approved press release regarding Jeffrey Epstein is finalized and instructions are given to distribute the PDF version to media outlets. The email indicates about 50 reporters had contacted the Office of Public Affairs (OPA).

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated August 10, 2019, concerning a press release about Jeffrey Epstein.
The press release was approved for distribution from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
Instructions specify that only the PDF version should be released to the media, while a Word document is for internal use.
Approximately 50 reporters had contacted the Office of Public Affairs regarding the matter.
The correspondence shows internal BOP coordination on public messaging about Epstein around the time of his incarceration.
